name: Jiangshi Jump
description:
Jiangshi Jump

Killed by paranoid villagers, your soul repossessed your body and became a Jiangshi, a jumping vampire-zombie. The only way to truly revive yourself is to create the fabled Elixir of Life. Can you make it into the Alchemic World and gather the ingredients necessary to complete it? 

PLEASE NOTE! Performance on WebGL is not very good, it is recommended to download the desktop application instead.

Controls:

Left Mouse Button - Jump to the location the cursor is aiming at
Right Mouse Button - Rotate camera

Credits:

Lakota Eckman - Narrative, Sound Design
Brent Goldstein - Programming, Level Design, Management
Nyx Gonzalez - Programming, Level Design
Scott Visser - 3D Object Modeling, Terrain Modeling
Xi Chang Lin - 3D Object Modeling, Character Modeling

Game Development I Project in Unity @ Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute
